name: GHOLOR: Ghost and Color
description:
Gholor : Ghost and Color is a single player first person shooter game.
Gholor Is a game to teach players how to combine primary colors into secondary colors, but many ghosts will disturb you
Can you defeat the ghosts?  prove it here!

---How to Play----

1. Touch the "color" box to change the bullet color 

2. Shoot the ghost of the same color as the bullet 

3. If there is a ghost with the unique color "Violet, Green, Orange", use a combination of the available color boxes

4. You can't shoot the boss when it's white, beat the little ghosts to reveal the true color of the boss

5. Enjoyy!!

---Button---

WASD                  =   Move

Left Click            =  Shoot

R                              =  Reset Current Color
